data.name: Voodoomaster Vex
data.text: He wants to be a troll. He cries for battle and rattles for death.

data.name: Witty Weaponplay
data.text: Increased stats.

data.name: Backstab
data.text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
data.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

data.name: Cast from Shadow
data.text: Destroy all undamaged minions. Return the rest to their owner's hand.

data.name: Counterfeit Coin
data.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
data.flavor: There is something funny about this coin… can't quite put my finger on it…

data.name: King Togwaggle
data.text: Look out! He's loaded with loot from failed adventurers.

data.name: Preparation
data.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.
data.flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

data.name: Rogue
data.text: Select Rogue as your next class.

data.name: Second Class: Rogue
data.text: Add Rogue cards to your deck.

data.name: Shadow Reflection
data.text: Each time you play a card, transform this into a copy of it.

data.name: Shadow Reflection
data.text: Each time you play a card, transform this into a copy of it until the end of your turn.

data.name: Shadowstep
data.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It_costs (2) less.
data.flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

data.name: Test Subject
data.text: Poisonous

data.name: The Saint
data.text: Assassinate with blinding speed!

data.name: Treasure Vault
data.text: Grab all you can, as fast as you can!

data.name: Bladed Cultist
data.text: Combo: Gain +1/+1.
data.flavor: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

data.name: Bloodthistle Toxin
data.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand.\nIt costs (2) less.

data.name: Briarthorn Toxin
data.text: Give a minion +3 Attack.

data.name: Buccaneer
data.text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
data.flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

data.name: Cold Blood
data.text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
data.flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

data.name: Conceal
data.text: Give your minions Stealth until your next_turn.
data.flavor: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

data.name: Deadly Poison
data.text: Give your weapon +2_Attack.
data.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

data.name: Déjà Vu
data.text: Discover a copy of a spell you played this game.

data.name: Doomerang
data.text: Throw your weapon at a minion. It deals its damage, then returns to_your hand.
data.flavor: Guaranteed to return your weapon directly to your hand! (Wear gloves. Thick ones.)

data.name: Fadeleaf Toxin
data.text: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.

data.name: Firebloom Toxin
data.text: Deal $2 damage.

data.name: Hallucination
data.text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
data.flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

data.name: Journey Below
data.text: Discover a Deathrattle card.
data.flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.

data.name: Kingsbane
data.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck. It keeps any enchantments.
data.flavor: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

data.name: Kingsblood Toxin
data.text: Draw a card.

data.name: Pit Snake
data.text: Poisonous
data.flavor: It could be worse.  It could be a Snake Pit.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Radioactive Ooze
data.text: Poisonous\nRush

data.name: Razorpetal
data.text: Deal $1 damage.

data.name: Sinister Strike
data.text: Deal $3 damage to the_enemy hero.
data.flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

data.name: Smoke Bomb
data.text: Give a minion Stealth until your next turn. Draw a card.

data.name: Swashburglar
data.text: Battlecry: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
data.flavor: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: The Caverns Below
data.text: [x]Quest: Play five minions\nwith the same name.\nReward: Crystal Core.
data.flavor: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

data.name: Betrayal
data.text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
data.flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

data.name: Biteweed
data.text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.
data.flavor: AKA Edwin VanLeaf.

data.name: Blade Flurry
data.text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemies.

data.name: Cash In
data.text: Destroy your weapon, gaining a random one.

data.name: Cavern Shinyfinder
data.text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon from your deck.
data.flavor: They call her the candled vandal.

data.name: Cheap Shot
data.text: Echo\n Deal $2 damage to a_minion.
data.flavor: 50% off. Every shot must go!

data.name: Cheat Death
data.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.\nIt costs (2) less.
data.flavor: Reported.

data.name: Cutpurse
data.text: Whenever this minion attacks a hero, add the Coin to your hand.
data.flavor: He has a giant collection of purses now.  One for every outfit!

data.name: Dagger Mastery
data.text: Hero Power\nEquip a 1/2 Dagger.

data.name: Dagger Mastery
data.text: Hero Power\nEquip a 1/2 Dagger.

data.name: Defias Ringleader
data.text: Combo: Summon a 2/1 Defias Bandit.
data.flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

data.name: Evasion
data.text: Secret: After your hero takes damage, become Immune this turn.
data.flavor: Works on weapons, missiles, and taxes.

data.name: Eviscerate
data.text: Deal $2 damage. Combo: Deal $4 damage instead.
data.flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent:  It takes a long time to get blood stains out of leather armor.

data.name: Gadgetzan Ferryman
data.text: Combo: Return a friendly minion to your hand.
data.flavor: Is it just me, or is there something fishy about that ferryman?

data.name: Gang Up
data.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
data.flavor: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Goblin Auto-Barber
data.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
data.flavor: This guy is excellent at adjusting your haircut and/or height.

data.name: Jade Shuriken
data.text: Deal $2 damage.\nCombo: Summon a Jade Golem.
data.flavor: Good news is, after you remove it from your wound, you can use it to pay your medical bills!

data.name: Jade Swarmer
data.text: Stealth\nDeathrattle: Summon a Jade Golem.
data.flavor: He's so good at swarming, he can swarm all by himself!

data.name: Lab Recruiter
data.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 copies of a friendly minion into your deck.
data.flavor: Join the chemistry lab! We've got all the solutions.

data.name: Leeching Poison
data.text: Give your weapon Lifesteal.
data.flavor: No actual leeches were harmed in the creation of this card.

data.name: One-eyed Cheat
data.text: Whenever you summon a Pirate, gain Stealth.
data.flavor: When pirates say there is no "Eye" in "team," they are very literal about it.

data.name: Patient Assassin
data.text: Stealth\n Poisonous
data.flavor: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

data.name: Pick Pocket
data.text: Echo\nAdd a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
data.flavor: He'll pick anyone's pocket, except a gnome's. He'd never stoop so low.

data.name: Pogo-Hopper
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for\neach other Pogo-Hopper\nyou played this game.
data.flavor: Once you hop, you just can't stop!

data.name: Poisoned Daggers
data.text: Hero Power\nEquip a 2/2 Weapon.

data.name: Poisoned Daggers
data.text: Hero Power\nEquip a 2/2 Weapon.

data.name: Razorpetal Lasher
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a\nRazorpetal to your hand\nthat deals 1 damage.
data.flavor: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

data.name: Razorpetal Volley
data.text: Add two Razorpetals to_your hand that deal_1 damage.
data.flavor: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

data.name: Roll the Bones
data.text: Draw a card.\nIf it has Deathrattle, cast this again.
data.flavor: Call it: Heads or Tailbone…

data.name: Sap
data.text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
data.flavor: Rogues love sappy movies.

data.name: Sharpen
data.text: Hero Power\nIncrease your weapon's attack by 1

data.name: Shiv
data.text: Deal $1 damage.\nDraw a card.
data.flavor: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

data.name: Sudden Betrayal
data.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of_its neighbors.
data.flavor: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

data.name: Undercity Huckster
data.text: Deathrattle: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
data.flavor: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

data.name: Undercity Valiant
data.text: Combo: Deal 1 damage.
data.flavor: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

data.name: Beneath the Grounds
data.text: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
data.flavor: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

data.name: Blink Fox
data.text: Battlecry: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
data.flavor: It's like, SUPER bad at staring contests.

data.name: Burgle
data.text: Add 2 random cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).
data.flavor: Yoink!

data.name: Cogmaster's Wrench
data.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
data.flavor: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!

data.name: Cutthroat Buccaneer
data.text: Combo: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
data.flavor: In life he worked as a sword swallower.

data.name: Deadly Fork
data.text: Deathrattle: Add a 3/2 weapon to your hand.
data.flavor: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Edwin VanCleef
data.text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each other card you've played this turn.
data.flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

data.name: Envenom Weapon
data.text: Give your weapon Poisonous.
data.flavor: Like Deadly Poison, but deadlier.

data.name: Face Collector
data.text: Echo\nBattlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
data.flavor: “I’ll trade you a Malfurion for an Anduin.”

data.name: Fan of Knives
data.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw_a card.
data.flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

data.name: Headcrack
data.text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
data.flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

data.name: Iron Sensei
data.text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
data.flavor: Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language.\n\n0110100001101001

data.name: Mimic Pod
data.text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.
data.flavor: Jinx!

data.name: Necrium Blade
data.text: Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion.
data.flavor: Grab death by the handle.

data.name: Nerubian Ambush!
data.text: Casts When Drawn\nSummon a 4/4 Nerubian for your opponent.

data.name: Perdition's Blade
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
data.flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

data.name: Plague Scientist
data.text: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
data.flavor: The excruciating pain means it's working!

data.name: Shadow Rager
data.text: Stealth
data.flavor: WE WENT THERE!

data.name: Shadow Strike
data.text: Deal $5 damage to an undamaged character.
data.flavor: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

data.name: Shadowblade
data.text: Battlecry: Your hero is Immune this turn.
data.flavor: It's tacky to call it "Shadeblade."

data.name: Shady Dealer
data.text: Battlecry: If you have a Pirate, gain +1/+1.
data.flavor: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!

data.name: Shaku, the Collector
data.text: [x]Stealth. Whenever this attacks, add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
data.flavor: Aya even staged an intervention once, but Shaku still insists that he is not a hoarder.

data.name: SI:7 Agent
data.text: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
data.flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

data.name: Sonya Shadowdancer
data.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).
data.flavor: Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like a 1/1 is watching.

data.name: Unearthed Raptor
data.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its_Deathrattle.
data.flavor: Still hunting for the ones who earthed him.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Violet Haze
data.text: Add 2 random Deathrattle cards to_your hand.
data.flavor: Elite Tauren Chieftain's next hit single.

data.name: Academic Espionage
data.text: Shuffle 10 cards from your opponent's class into your deck. They_cost (1).
data.flavor: The tenth Pyroblast really felt like overkill.

data.name: Anub'ar Ambusher
data.text: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
data.flavor: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Blade Flurry
data.text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
data.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

data.name: Blightnozzle Crawler
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Ooze with Poisonous and Rush.
data.flavor: "Well we HAD it contained. Then you went and gave it legs!"

data.name: Elven Minstrel
data.text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
data.flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

data.name: Fal'dorei Strider
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
data.flavor: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

data.name: Kobold Illusionist
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
data.flavor: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

data.name: Lilian Voss
data.text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
data.flavor: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

data.name: Master of Disguise
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
data.flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

data.name: Mistwraith
data.text: Whenever you play an Echo_card, gain +1/+1.
data.flavor: One little Mistwraith sitting in a tree. M-I-S-T-I-N-G.

data.name: Obsidian Shard
data.text: [x]Costs (1) less for each\ncard you've played from\nanother class.
data.flavor: You know you’re a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go “Ooh!  Dagger!”

data.name: Poisoned Blade
data.text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
data.flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

data.name: Runeforge Haunter
data.text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
data.flavor: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

data.name: Ryan Masterson
data.text: Battlecry: Cast copies of Backstab, Cold Blood, and Eviscerate. (targets chosen randomly).

data.name: Sabotage
data.text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Combo: And your opponent's weapon.
data.flavor: Rogues can't stand it. They know you planned it! They are going to set you straight!

data.name: Shadow Sensei
data.text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +2/+2.
data.flavor: He used to be Aya's tutor, but she fired him for bugging her too much.

data.name: Sherazin, Corpse Flower
data.text: Deathrattle: Go dormant. Play 4 cards in a turn to revive this minion.
data.flavor: A Tortollan gardener's worst nightmare.

data.name: Southsea Squidface
data.text: Deathrattle: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
data.flavor: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

data.name: Spectral Cutlass
data.text: [x]Lifesteal Whenever you play a card from another class, gain +1 Durability.
data.flavor: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

data.name: Spider Ambush!
data.text: Casts When Drawn\nSummon a 4/4 Spider.

data.name: Thief of Futures
data.text: Battlecry: Add a copy of the top card of your opponent's deck to your hand.

data.name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
data.text: Give your weapon +3 Attack. Combo: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack.
data.flavor: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry

data.name: Tomb Pillager
data.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
data.flavor: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: WANTED!
data.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a Coin to your hand.
data.flavor: Wanted: Dead or Undead.

data.name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
data.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
data.flavor: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

data.name: Assassin's Blade
data.flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

data.name: Assassinate
data.text: Destroy an enemy minion.
data.flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

data.name: Bone Baron
data.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
data.flavor: "Oil," "Rail," and "Blubber" were already taken.

data.name: Crazed Chemist
data.text: Combo: Give a friendly minion +4 Attack.
data.flavor: You don't have to be crazy to work here, but it helps.

data.name: Crystal Core
data.text: For the rest of the game, your minions are 4/4.

data.name: Dark Iron Skulker
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
data.flavor: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Ethereal Peddler
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards from another class, reduce their Cost by (2).
data.flavor: Yeah, sure. That Ragnaros "fell off the back of a truck".
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Greater Onyx Spellstone
data.text: Destroy up to 3 random enemy minions.

data.name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
data.text: (Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
data.flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

data.name: Lotus Assassin
data.text: Stealth. Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain Stealth.
data.flavor: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

data.name: Myra Rotspring
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\nDeathrattle minion. Also\ngain its Deathrattle.
data.flavor: On her first day on the job, Myra removed the smoke detectors.

data.name: Myra's Unstable Element
data.text: Draw the rest of\nyour deck.
data.flavor: What could go wrong?

data.name: Necrium Vial
data.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
data.flavor: Two near-death experiences for the price of one!

data.name: Ogre Ninja
data.text: Stealth\n50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
data.flavor: He didn't have the grades to get into ninja school, but his dad pulled some strings.

data.name: Shado-Pan Rider
data.text: Combo: Gain +3 Attack.
data.flavor: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

data.name: Shadowcaster
data.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 1/1 copy to_your hand that costs_(1).
data.flavor: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.

data.name: Vilespine Slayer
data.text: Combo: Destroy a minion.
data.flavor: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

data.name: Cursed Castaway
data.text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Draw a Combo card from your deck.
data.flavor: She was an ordinary castaway... until she found that cursed volleyball.

data.name: Kidnapper
data.text: Combo: Return a minion to_its owner's hand.
data.flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

data.name: Luckydo Buccaneer
data.text: Battlecry: If your weapon has at least 3 Attack, gain +4/+4.
data.flavor: You can't just leave a Luckydo somewhere.  You gotta keep 'em with you!  Especially in Gadgetzan!

data.name: Spectral Pillager
data.text: [x]Combo: Deal damage equal\nto the number of other cards\nyou've played this turn.
data.flavor: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

data.name: Thistle Tea
data.text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
data.flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

data.name: Trade Prince Gallywix
data.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain a copy of it and give them a Coin.
data.flavor: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!

data.name: Vanish
data.text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

data.name: Sprint
data.text: Draw 4 cards.
data.flavor: Rogues are not good joggers.

data.name: Tess Greymane
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
data.flavor: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

data.name: Tess Greymane
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 8 damage\nto all minions and choose\na Passive Treasure.

data.name: Anub'arak
data.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand and summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
data.flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

data.name: Blade of C'Thun
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to_your C'Thun's (wherever it is).
data.flavor: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

data.name: Valeera the Hollow
data.text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
data.flavor: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."

data.name: Valeera the Hollow
data.text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.

data.name: Sherazin, Seed
data.text: When you play 4 cards in a_turn, revive this minion.
